basics.name: Aviation Operation Specialist
basics.label: Client Support Specialist II
basics.summary: Pursuing a position as a Client Support Specialist II, along with the opportunity to achieve and maintain the highest level of customer service, data compilation, and team excellence.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Compiled, managed, and maintained sensitive flight data for more than 60 aviators ensuring all flight departures and arrivals were successful and all aviator flight information was accurately and consistently logged for daily and weekly flight reports.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed over 1 million dollars of Federal funds in travel arrangements, claims and travel reimbursements for over 300 employees using Defense Travel Operating Systems (DTS)

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Secret security clearance. Created weekly rotational day and night flight schedules on excel
